2. Love - old
3. Peace - young

7. Laughter - young

9. Agony - old
10. Terrible - old
11. Horrible - old
12. Nasty - old
13. Evil - old
14. Awful - old
15. Failure - old
16. Hurt - old

I hope this exercise brings us closer together, my love.

Yours always,
[Your Name]
